palabras.definicion: To get or be given something
To produce music, poetry, or formal writing
To stop doing something or leave a job or a place
To fasten together two ends of a piece of string or other long, thin material
Acknowledge, honor, or celebrate an important event or occasion with a particular action.
To say that something is not true
To express your choice or opinion, especially by officially writing a mark on a paper or by raising your hand or speaking in a meeting
Perform duties or services for another person or an organization
